subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro beat Pablo Cuevas by 6-2, 7-6 (6) Saturday to gain the Estoril Open men’s final, and Medina Garrigues of Spain won the rain-delayed women’s title match in Oeiras, Portugal.
snippet: Juan Martín del Potro beat Pablo Cuevas by 6-2, 7-6 (6) Saturday to gain the Estoril Open men’s final, and Medina Garrigues of Spain won the rain-delayed women’s title match in Oeiras, Portugal.
